## Code blocks

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

N = 10
x = np.linspace(0, 1, num=N)
y = np.sin(2 * np.pi * x)
y = y + np.random.normal(loc=0, scale=0.3, size=x.shape)

_, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(5, 3))
ax.plot(x, np.sin(2 * np.pi * x), lw=2, c="lightgreen", label=f"s")
ax.plot(x, y, ls="none", marker="o", mfc="none", mec="blue", mew=2, ms=8, label="noisy")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```
